5
What’s the Problem?
•
 
Typical web page 
markup
 
consists of:
•
 
Rendering
 
information (e.g., 
font size and colour)
•
 
Hyper-links to related content
•
 
Semantic content is 
accessible to humans 
but not (easily) to 
computers…
